name: Silent Hills Map
description:
After very rough couple of months making this I finally delivered as I promised. Here you have fully recreated 1:1 with original models Silent Hills cutscene map. Explore now for free, enjoy!

Follow me: twitter.com/arturlaczkowski

Support me: paypal.me/arturstudios

Patreon: patreon.com/arturstudios

You can also play my perfect P.T. Emulation directly from PS4 here:

-> PLAY IT HERE <-

Best played with a controller and headphones, for starting menu use mouse. Also if you have any questions, problems etc I always respond on twitter.
